text: Producer, can I ask you something?

The script just says "Onigokko at the school festival",
right?

Could you,
give me a bit more details about it?
Ah, I see why you're curious.

I think we'll probably get more detailed explanations
right before the shoot on the day...

The show we're shooting this time
apparently requires talent's improvisational skills.

Honestly, I haven't received
that much detailed explanation either.

Sorry,
I can't give you a better explanation.
No, I think it's only natural

for the situation like this. To be honest,
I want to go into the shoot fully prepared...

But, it's "that kind of job",
so I'll do my best.

If I were alone,
I think I'd be even more anxious...──
But Mano and Meguru are here.
